name: Strongest Potions
description:
As an alchemist you are trying to distil increasingly strong potions.

However, the volatile chemical reactions that take place inside a potion leave them unstable - prone to catching fire and exploding.

As a seasoned alchemist, you must air cool your potions while combining pairs of potions together to make a stronger potion.

Controls:

Click and Drag (Mouse)

There is a short explanation of how to play in game

Other Stuff:

Made as part of the Game Maker's Toolkit jam 2020.

Every thing made by me, including the sound (There is no sound)
